name: Consulting Engagement
description: Template for consulting projects and client engagements

taskTemplates.name: Kickoff meeting
taskTemplates.description: Initial client meeting to understand requirements and expectations

taskTemplates.name: Discovery and analysis
taskTemplates.description: Gather information, analyze current state, and identify gaps

taskTemplates.name: Develop recommendations
taskTemplates.description: Create strategic recommendations and action plan

taskTemplates.name: Present findings
taskTemplates.description: Deliver presentation to stakeholders and gather feedback

taskTemplates.name: Training and knowledge transfer
taskTemplates.description: Train client team and document processes

taskTemplates.name: Final review and handoff
taskTemplates.description: Review outcomes, document lessons learned, and complete engagement

phases.name: Discovery
phases.description: Understand client needs and current state
